Package uno.cards

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action_Card
    The Action_Card class provides an UNO action card.
    BasicPlayTests
    Test the Basic play functions.
    Deck
    Deck provides a standard deck of 108 UNO cards.
    Draw2Tests
    Test response to Draw 2 on top of discard pile.
    Draw4Tests
    Tests Player's respons to Wild Draw 4 on top of discard pile.
    Face_Card
    The Face_Card class defines a UNO face card.
    Hand
    The Hand class provides a simple Hand mechnaism for an UNO game.
    TestReporting
    Test the reporting functions of the Player Class.
    UNO_Card
    The UNO_Card class provides the base class for all UNO cards.
    UNOPassingTests
    Tests if Player passes and calls win correctly.
    WildCardTests
    Tests Player's response to a Wild card on top of draw pile.
